name: min_25_sieve
chinese_name: 一些特殊的数论函数求和问题
author: 朱震霆
complexity: O(n^{3/4}/\log n) for Min_25 sieve; O((x/\log x)^{2/3}) for prime k-th power sum; \tilde{O}(n^{1/3}) for divisor summatory function via Stern-Brocot cutting.
summary: The paper discusses advanced techniques for summing special number-theoretic functions, focusing on three main parts: a simplified version of the sieve method for multiplicative functions (known as Min_25 sieve), efficient computation of prime power sums using Meissel-Lehmer-like methods, and an innovative geometric approach using Stern-Brocot Tree to compute divisor summatory functions by counting lattice points under hyperbolas.
